quote: Two roads diverged in a wood, and I took the one less traveled by, And that has made all the difference.
author: Robert Frost

quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: Life is what happens to you while you’re busy making other plans.
author: John Lennon

quote: Every child is an artist. The problem is how to remain an artist once he grows up.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: I didn’t fail the test. I just found 100 ways to do it wrong.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Build your own dreams, or someone else will hire you to build theirs.
author: Farrah Gray

quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

quote: If you do what you’ve always done, you’ll get what you’ve always gotten.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Either write something worth reading or do something worth writing.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Expect problems and eat them for breakfast.
author: Alfred A. Montapert

quote: Pain is just weakness leaving your body.
author: Gen Lewis B. Puller

quote: We have just enough religion to make us hate, but not enough to make us love one another.
author: Jonathan Swift

quote: There is nothing permanent except change.
author: Heraclitus
